entities.name: slytherin quidditch team
entities.description: The Slytherin Quidditch team is mentioned as the one responsible for the catcalls and jeers. They are described as being in the empty stands, shouting loudly around the stadium.

entities.name: hangers-on
entities.description: The hangers-on are a group of people who are grouped halfway up the empty stands and are shouting along with the Slytherin Quidditch team. They are not specified further in the text.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as calling out to Weasley, asking what he's riding and making a sneering comment about it being a moldy old log. He is described as having a sneering drawl.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as guffawing and shrieking with laughter along with Goyle and Pansy Parkinson when Malfoy makes his comment about Weasley's broomstick.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as guffawing and shrieking with laughter along with Crabbe and Pansy Parkinson when Malfoy makes his comment about Weasley's broomstick.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is mentioned as guffawing and shrieking with laughter along with Crabbe and Goyle when Malfoy makes his comment about Weasley's broomstick.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as riding a broomstick that the Slytherin Quidditch team is making fun of. He is described as having a Flying Charm on his broomstick.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as ignoring the catcalls and jeers from the Slytherin Quidditch team and following Ron on his broomstick. He is described as watching his ears turn red.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as riding a broomstick that the Slytherin Quidditch team is making fun of. Harry follows him on his own broomstick.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: Angelina Johnson is mentioned as soaring around them with the Quaffle under her arm and slowing to hover in front of her airborne team. She approves of Harry's attitude.

entities.name: quidditch teams
entities.description: The text mentions that there are two Quidditch teams playing - the Slytherin Quidditch team and presumably the Gryffindor Quidditch team (which is not explicitly mentioned but implied by the context).

entities.name: quaffle
entities.description: The Quaffle is a piece of equipment used in Quidditch. It is described as being under Angelina Johnson's arm.

relationships.description: Harry Potter follows Ron Weasley on his broomstick, ignoring the catcalls and jeers from the Slytherin Quidditch team.
Angelina Johnson approves of Harry Potter's attitude, saying 'Exactly the attitude I want, Harry'.
